fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Choose a resident to attack at night

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- At the start of the game, players are informed that they may visit a spooky mansion for the chance to receive a prize during the day
- Players who choose to visit you have a 20% chance to win a charge if they have a limited use ability, or receive a 1 time use basic autovest as long as they’re not attacked by you the following night
- If you kill a fellow town member, your mansion gets closed down for investigation. You get arrested, and die in a prison cell.
